name: tekton-pipeline-combo
description: Unified build system for Tekton Pipeline Renderer package and VSCode extension

scripts.preinstall: node -e "if(process.env.npm_execpath.indexOf('yarn') === -1) throw new Error('Please use yarn')"
scripts.clean: yarn workspace tekton-pipeline-renderer run clean && yarn workspace tekton-vscode run clean && rm -rf dist
scripts.build: npm run build:renderer && npm run build:vscode
scripts.test: npm run test:renderer && npm run test:vscode
scripts.lint: yarn workspace tekton-pipeline-renderer run lint && yarn workspace tekton-vscode run lint
scripts.lint:fix: yarn workspace tekton-pipeline-renderer run lint:fix && yarn workspace tekton-vscode run lint:fix
scripts.ci: npm run clean && npm run install:all && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.ci:github: npm run lint && npm run build:renderer && npm run build:extension && npm run vscode:package
scripts.release:check: npm run ci && npm run propagate && npm run test
scripts.release:prepare: npm run release:check && npm run build:extension

author: Your Name
